messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

windows upgrade not available sc re upgrade issue hi yes yes yes your questions thanks sent tuesday re upgrade issue hello please let know if situation have changed by please let know if otherwise meantime please check following your number en you have least free space drive when applying upgrade you connected wired can you please check client active en kind regards infrastructure manager ext phone sent tuesday re upgrade issue good morning believe have heard anything back you guys days have tried perform upgrade again have same results can you please advise due be travelling want any issues whilst abroad thanks sent friday upgrade issue hi have attempted upgrade failed choose operating point there upgrade pack option fact there options displayed have asked site engineer check make doing anything wrong confirmed have genuine issue can you advise please thanks client manager
